settings.success.title: <:Success:1113824546911440956> Success
settings.level.buttons.button.setting_al:
To specify your own embeds, you need to go to the site (**JSON Constructor**) and create an embed there, copying the final code!

**Key designations for using variables:**
**https://+member_avatar+** - Link to the member's avatar (For footer, author, etc.)
**+member+** - Specify the member
**+last_rank+** - Previous level
**+rank+** - New level
**+prestige+** - Prestige
**+can_prestige+** - Can prestige (Available/Unavailable)
**+now_exp+** - New level
**+need_exp+** - Needed experience
